@sophiaalthammer @yasinmcphe Thanks @sophiaalthammer !
We're actually meeting next week - thanks to you :)

Filtering search results based on the user's knowledge. My discussion paper presented at the Italian Information Retrieval workshop #IIR2021 is now available for reading. @2021Iir 
https://t.co/PX7L03WcZK

Sharing with you my extended abstract presented at the #DESIRES2021 conference, proposing a framework & collection to evaluate users' knowledge gain during their search.

Happy reading!

https://t.co/IYr3IcAYNp

#Research #knowledgechange #informationretrieval #searchaslearning
